title: PoC for supporting nested inputs natively in new-style Function. [WIP]
body_html:
What is not implemented yet:

  • Flattening gradient outputs (which is going to be annoying)
  • Some sort of flag, so that the flattening/unflattening behavior
    is explicitly opt in

I'm putting this up in case someone wants to complain about making
gnarly python_function.cpp even gnarlier.

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang ezyang@fb.com

body:
What is not implemented yet:
- Flattening gradient outputs (which is going to be annoying)
- Some sort of flag, so that the flattening/unflattening behavior
  is explicitly opt in

I'm putting this up in case someone wants to complain about making
gnarly python_function.cpp even gnarlier.

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
